content.text:
# Edward Ciągło

Edward Ciągło (born 15 October 1953 in Gołkowice Dolne) is a Polish politician. He was elected to the Sejm on 25 September 2005, getting 9470 votes in 14 Nowy Sącz district as a candidate from the League of Polish Families list.
See also
*Members of Polish Sejm 2005-2007
External links
*[https://web.archive.org/web/20060805140541/http://www.sejm.gov.pl/poslowie/posel5/040.htm Edward Ciągło - parliamentary page] - includes declarations of interest, voting record, and transcripts of speeches.
